title: Mastery of Western Music Notation Based on Cognitive Load Theory

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of basic music theory (note reading, rhythmic concepts)
context.additional_context: A customized course for vocational trainees aiming to improve music notation literacy in smartphone-based learning environments.

learning_goals: Learners can identify notes, rests, and time signatures used in Western standard music notation with 85% accuracy within four weeks.
Learners can vocally reproduce accurate rhythm patterns from given sheet music with 90% accuracy.
Learners can recognize intervals from 2nd to 5th degrees on sheet music and sing them with precise pitch.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
